title.rendered: Athenahealth supports Smile Foundation through Mobile Health Units

content.rendered:
Athenahealth’s healthcare project with Smile Foundation

In 2022, Athenahealth joined forces with Smile Foundation to launch two Mobile Health Units. One unit serves the community in Bangalore, while the other reaches people in Chennai.

These mobile clinics are designed to provide primary healthcare services directly to underserved areas, improving access to medical care where it’s needed most. Through this initiative, Athenahealth and Smile Foundation are helping to bridge the gap in healthcare delivery for more people to receive the treatment and support they deserve.

Athenahealth supports Smile Foundation through Mobile Health Units

 In 2022-23, Athena Health forged a partnership with Smile Foundation to establish two Mobile Health Units to serve the communities in Chennai and Bangalore. Through these projects, a total of 15,478 beneficiaries were able to access and benefit from essential primary healthcare services. This collaboration between Athena Health and Smile Foundation has played a crucial role in improving healthcare accessibility and positively impacting the lives of individuals in these regions.
